snippet: A week with Afghan troops safeguarding Highway 1 offers glimpses of a road war in which powerful leaders on all sides battle for control of Afghanistan’s crucial artery.
abstract: International military coalition is leaving the protection of Afghanistan's Highway 1, crucial artery of communication and commerce that links Kabul with major cities, almost entirely to Afghan Army forces; it is one of the world's most dangerous roads, and forces must respond to domestic disputes and traffic accidents, as well as hidden explosives and sniper fire.
lead_paragraph: A week with Afghan troops safeguarding Highway 1 offers glimpses of a road war in which powerful leaders on all sides battle for control of Afghanistan’s crucial artery.

headline.main: Afghan Army’s Test Begins With Fight for Vital Highway
headline.print_headline: Afghan Army’s Test Begins With Fight for Vital Highway
